item.title: Plastic strap packaging causing serious injury., 17th November
item.description:
Barnett Way opposite pavement to Sainsburyâ€™s. Near the large Green and white building. Dangerous parcel packaging caused injury to a pedestrian who fell badly and had to have stitches to their face. If could have caused more damage like loss of teeth and broken arms etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnett Way, Barnwood, Gloucester

item.title: Illegal parking of an 8-tonne cherry picker in Jasper Close, enforcement required for removal as emergency services will not be able to access resident's properties., 17th November
item.description:
The 8-tonne cherry picker belongs to 8 Jasper Close a shared ownership leasehold tenant who is refusing to move it out of Jasper Close. It is causing a safety and access issue for emergency services, it is structurally damaging the ornate block paving. It is a child safety risk as children are climbing the vehicle, it is a breach of tenancy agreement signed by tenant

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jasper Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 17th November
item.description:
Customer reports that the gullies are blocked O/S 38 Albert place GL52 2JX. The customer had mentioned that she was close to flooding. she has mention ed the drains are blocked again with leaves and she has asked if the drains can be investigated as this blocks quite oftern and is very concering as they almosted flooded.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover has sunken at Pirton Corner, 16th November
item.description:
The drain / drain cover has sunken at Pirton / Chelt Road corner (Churchdown), closest to the petrol station. There are several drains, but just THIS ONE has dropped, and it's making a very loud rattle. Hopefully that doesn't mean it's about to collapse ?! It's in the left hand side of the main highway so traffic CANNOT avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing the blue mini roundabout sign, 16th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple blocked drains on Farmfield road, 16th November
item.description:
Multiple storm drains are blocked along Farmfield road which results in a stream running down the road which flows onto the pavement. This has been the case for some time and the rain runs over the top of the drains. The issue is outside no. 150 and stretches down towards Lincoln avenue and up Farmfield road towards Shurdington road with blocked drains in both directions

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 150, Farmfield Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
